nodes.text: Schlap was a male Human Meatlump cook who lived on the planet Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Schlap worked in the kitchen of the Meatlump Hideout beneath Coronet City. He served as assistant chef to Chef Schlump, the personal chef of the Meatlump King. They used to cook meatlumps and produce Meatlump wine.

Assistant Chef Schlap was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Schlap was added to the game as part of the "Meatlumps Theme Park", introduced with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
